name: Coniun
description: What is the project about? Coniun is a Web3 company that started its journey as a utility NFT project. They’ve been providing both B2B and B2C utilities for the NFT market in the last 12 months, such as an AI-driven NFT analytics tool (Coniun.io), whitelist distribution tool for projects, wl allocation pool from upcoming projects (C-BOX), and more. Their first NFT collection’s (Coniun Pass) floor price hit 2 ETH and generated a $15M volume.They are now tokenizing their ecosystem to make it more sustainable and scalable. What makes your project unique? History of your project. What’s next for your project? What can your token be used for?
